definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The people cultivate mainly rice and beans.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的人們主要種植稻子和豆類。

sentences.english: The rice was then in flower.
He grew rice and other produce, which were mostly needed for family consumption.
sentences.chinese: 他種稻子和其它農產品，主要用於自家消費。

sentences.english: As we cut the paddy it started to rain.
sentences.chinese: 我們收割稻子時，開始下雨。

sentences.english: This plot of paddy doesn't seem to be any worse than that one.
sentences.chinese: 這片稻子不見得比那片差。

sentences.english: Rice grown in the mountains was a special kind of rice.
sentences.chinese: 後來在飯山上長出一種特殊的稻子。
稻子生長在溫暖的地區。

sentences.english: A vast golden stretch of rice was waiting to be cut.
sentences.chinese: 一大片金黃的稻子等着收割。

sentences.english: It's good to smell the scent of ripening rice in November.
sentences.chinese: 十一月，聞着正在成熟的稻子的香味是真好啊。

sentences.english: He can't tell rice from wheat in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 他不能區分長在地裏的稻子與小麥。

sentences.english: And the outside is actually farmland, terraced field that grows rice.
sentences.chinese: 而山的外面則是真正的農田，是可以種植稻子的梯田。

sentences.english: The peasants are harvesting rice in the field.
sentences.chinese: 農民們正在田野裏收割稻子。

sentences.english: My parents grow rice and wheat on our farm.
sentences.chinese: 我父母在農場上種稻子和小麥。

sentences.english: It is simply a miracle that rice should grow in such a place.
sentences.chinese: 稻子竟然能在這樣的地方生長，這實在是個奇蹟。

definition: to have the ears of grain come up
variant of 包穀|包谷[bao1 gu3]
